amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Jessica Gonzales Victims Assistance program by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for the Jessica Gonzales Victims Assistants program by $5,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A063) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A063) offered by Mr. Nadler.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A063) Agreed to by voice vote.
